channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report E-2024010120
item.description:
Report E-2024010120

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-12T18:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: ATLANTA
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal NAT experienced a UN1992 Pro Form Lacquer Thinner Fast 19122 release from a 5-gallon metal pail. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-gallon of product released to a 2’ x 2’ area of the trailer floor due to a forklift puncture. Upon contractor arrival the released material had dried/evaporated and there was no material to collect with absorbents. The damaged pail was collected into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024010277
item.description:
Report X-2024010277

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-17T15:11:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: KENNESAW
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024010277 SequenceEvent: Qa was call over due to a leaking hazmat. DescribePack: Caps was loose on the hazmat causing hazmat to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Qa clean up the spill place hazmat inside the red containers to be taken over for process. 2. X-2024010280 SequenceEvent: Qa was call over to unload due to a leaking hazmat. DescribePack: The hazmat caps were loose causing hazmat to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Qa clean up the spill lace hazmat inside a red tote to be taken over to the hazmat area to be process.
